abstract: Editorial calls for increased transparency from Obama administration on expanding military campaign against Islamic State in Iraq and Syria; argues Pres Obama owes American people and his successor clear rationale for country's growing involvement and honest assessment of its costs.
snippet: President Obama should present a clear and forthright rationale before authorizing an escalation of the war against the Islamic State....

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

lead_paragraph: President Obama should present a clear and forthright rationale before authorizing an escalation of the war against the Islamic State.

headline.main: America Needs Frank Talk on ISIS
headline.print_headline: America Needs Frank Talk on ISIS
